DOC.brief_summary: The accuracy coronary plaque characterization Multi-slice compute tomography compare intravascular ultrasound optical coherence tomography investigate patient present acute coronary syndrome without ST-elevation .
DOC.criteria: Chest pain suggestive myocardial ischemia least 30 minute ; Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) STsegment shift ( STsegment depression > 1 mm least two contiguous lead transient STsegment elevation > 1mm duration < 30 min least two contiguous lead ) and/or Twave change ( Twave inversion > 1.5 mm least three contiguous lead ) ; Positive h Troponin T > 14 ng/L positive Troponin T < 0.01 Âµg/L Clinical indication invasive coronary angiography follow PCI ischemiarelated target lesion ; Informed consent . Persistent STelevation > 1 mm 2 lead ; Need emergency invasive coronary angiography percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) ; Need emergency coronary artery bypass grafting ; Presence cardiogenic shock ; Estimated glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) < 50 ml/min ; Known allergy iodine contrast agent ; Cardiac rhythms sinus rhythm ; Inability lay supine ; Inability tot sustain breathhold 15 second ; Inability provide inform consent .
